BBK01.BU1138: Central government debt - old debt resulting from German reunification

General: Excluding outstanding claims. On 1 July 1999, central government assumed joint responsibility for the debts of the Redemption Fund for Inherited Liabilities, the Federal Railways Fund and the Equalisation Fund for Safeguarding the Use of Coal.

Comment on 1999-07: On 1 July 1999, central government assumed joint responsibility for the debts of the Re-demption Fund for Inherited Liabilities, the Federal Railways Fund and the Equalisation Fund for Safeguarding the Use of Coal.
